transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yeah, hi sir, Vishal baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. Kaise hai sir?
Customer: Haan, boliye, boliye.
Executive: Sir actually apne paas ticket open hua tha regarding PVC conveyor belt tha na, jo hum service chala rahe the.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Wo sir wapas bhi range me aa chuka hai like humne lead abhi recently koi pick nahi karaya gaya us category se.
Customer: Mere ko usme se related relevant lead bhi nahi aa rahi na itni khas.
Executive: To sir apne paas jo pehle se inquiries padi hongi aap unse bhi apply kar lijiye, practice ko wapas active kara paye.
Customer: Wo to mera chalu hai abhi to staff bhi rakh diya na maine to wo to follow up le hi rahe hai.
Executive: Achha, staff rakh diya aapne sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To usme sir dekh hamari isme kam kar sakte ho aap abhi apne paas manually lead search kar lijiye PVC conveyor belt ke liye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Usko waha se pick kar lijiye, otherwise lead manager me jaake usko humne search kare.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai na? Kuch inquiries ko reward karna hoga taki wapas isko rank out kar paye.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Ji, wapas aap. Main ek kam karta hu.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Aapko 2:30 baje na madam ko phone laga ke deta hu unko aap thoda samjha dijiyega kaise kya karna hai wo sab.
Executive: 2:30 baje, sir 2:30 baje lunch time hota hai 3:00 baje connect kar lunga unse main. 
Customer: Haan chalega 3:00 baje connect kar lijiye kyuki main office me rahunga kyuki staff abhi maine rakh diya hai to thoda aap unko guide bhi kar dijiye kaise kya karna hai. Kitna staff rakha aapne? Video meet pe bula ke main kara deta hu.
Customer: Haan video meet pe bula lo chalega.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: To sir actually ye bata dijiye na ki hamare paas sir wo last reminder bhi aa raha tha jo offer aapko bataya gaya tha 2 plus one ka.
Customer: Nahi abhi filhal do nahi ji filhal kuch nahi thoda ruk jao please. Request hai abhi mere ko koi naya offer mat pitch karo kyuki abhi pehle maine bahut dal diya IndiaMART pe pehle mere ko ye isme se kuch agar conversion agar nikal gaya na to mere liye achha hoga to benefit hai na.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Barabar hai ki nahi? Haan. Ye bas thoda shanti shanti.
Executive: Haan okay.
Customer: Phone chalu hai do minute.
Executive: Ek kam karta hu sir main aapko WhatsApp pe hi kar raha hu aap mujhe unka details send kar de taki main uske according 3 baje connect kar leta hu video meet pe. Haan chalega nahi yahi number pe yahi number pe baat karni hogi aapko unse. Mobile maine khali haan mobile separate kar diya hai apne liye dusra phone rakha hai unke liye yahi apna business wala number udhar de rakha hai unko. 
Executive: Okay. Koi dikkat nahi hai main 3 baje connect kar lunga. 10 number rakhne se achha ek hi number rakho usi pe wo log coordinate karenge aur mere mobile se whatsapp se sab details hai chalta rahega mere paas sara data rahega. Haan mere paas data sara mere paas hi rahega. Hmm.
Executive: Achha achha sir. Wo sir API wagera activate kar liya aapne CRM aur API?
Customer: Kya kya?
Executive: CRM wagera jo apne paas hoga use kar rahe ho aap CRM me. To CRM software taki data wo maintain rahe apne paas.
Customer: Nahi pata nahi ye sab dekhta hu wahi 3 baje madam ek rahegi Shruti karke usko aap guide kar dijiyega ye sab.
Executive: Theek hai nahi sir ye CRM software hota hai main bata raha hu jo aapko. Usme sara data rehta hai na taki aapko in future kabhi kam pade to usme. Aap ek bar isko search kar lijiyega kya hota hai then aapko idea ho jayega kya.
Customer: Okay kya naam mere ko whatsapp kar dijiye na aap jo naam bol rahe hai. Thoda bache pareshan kar rahe hai khana khana hai dimag kharab kar rahe hai. 
Executive: Okay okay. Main aapko send kar deta hu. Okay. WhatsApp pe dal do data aap jo bol rahe hai data ka kya hai wo. Isme bata raha hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Customer does not want new offers.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested manually searching for leads.

- Executive offered to guide the staff.

- Executive will share CRM details on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect at 3:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, crm, follow up, staff
